# makeBody(configuration:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a view that represents the body of a product view.

## Declaration

```swift
@ViewBuilder @MainActor @preconcurrency func makeBody(configuration: Self.Configuration) -> Self.Body
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: The properties of a product view style.

## Creating custom product views

- **ProductViewStyle.Configuration**: A type that represents the properties of a product view style.
- **Body**: A view that represents the body of a product view.
